languages.text: {n}Голос Инцендии мрачен, как путь грешника.{/n} "Это след от поцелуя ледяной Преисподней. Богомерзкая Аспис, родством с которой я проклята, заточила меня в криосклеп, как и всю нашу семью. Она боялась, что однажды ее грехи перевесят чашу нашего терпения, и мы свергнем ее".

traits.locale_text: {n}Голос Инцендии мрачен, как путь грешника.{/n} "Это след от поцелуя ледяной Преисподней. Богомерзкая Аспис, родством с которой я проклята, заточила меня в криосклеп, как и всю нашу семью. Она боялась, что однажды ее грехи перевесят чашу нашего терпения, и мы свергнем ее".
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: {n}Incendia's voice is as dark as the path of an apostate.{/n} "It is a mark left by the kiss of a freezing nightmare. The ungodly Aspyce, to whom I am cursed to be related, had me imprisoned in a cryo-vault, as she did all our family. She was afraid that her transgressions would eventually tip the scales of our patience and we would dethrone her."
languages.original_text: {n}Голос Инцендии мрачен, как путь грешника.{/n} "Это след от поцелуя ледяной Преисподней. Богомерзкая Аспис, родством с которой я проклята, заточила меня в криосклеп, как и всю нашу семью. Она боялась, что однажды ее грехи перевесят чашу нашего терпения, и мы свергнем ее".

traits.locale_text: {n}Incendia's voice is dark as the path of a sinner.{/n} "It is a mark left by a kiss of freezing hell. The ungodly Aspyce, to whom I am cursed to be related, had imprisoned me in a cryo-vault, as she had all our family. She was afraid that her sins would eventually tip the scales of our patience and we would dethrone her."
traits.speaker: Chorda

The ungodly Aspyce, to whom I am cursed to be related, had me imprisoned in a cryo-vault, as she did all our family. She was afraid that her transgressions would eventually tip the scales of our patience and we would dethrone her."
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: {n}インセンディアの声色には背教者が歩む道のような暗さがある。{/n}「凍手ついた悪夢の接吻を受けた証だ。奴の血縁というのもいまいましいのだが、不信心者アスパイスは私を低温室に監禁し、私の家族皆が同じ扱いを受けた。最後は私達が耐え抜いて、罪を犯した奴を失脚に追い込むのではないかと、アスパイスは恐れていた」
languages.original_text: {n}Incendia's voice is as dark as the path of an apostate.{/n} "It is a mark left by the kiss of a freezing nightmare. The ungodly Aspyce, to whom I am cursed to be related, had me imprisoned in a cryo-vault, as she did all our family. She was afraid that her transgressions would eventually tip the scales of our patience and we would dethrone her."

traits.locale_text: {n}インセンディアの声色は罪人が歩む道のような暗さがある。{/n}「凍手ついた地獄の接吻を受けた証だ。奴の血縁というのもいまいましいのだが、不信心者アスパイスは私を低温室に監禁し、私の家族皆が同じ扱いを受けた。最後は私達が耐え抜いて、罪を犯した奴を失脚に追い込むのではないかと、アスパイスは恐れていた」
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: {n}因森蒂娅变得无比阴冷，仿佛叛教者踏上的道路一般。{/n}“这是那冰寒的噩梦留下的吻痕。那个该遭天谴的阿斯拜丝，我何其不幸，竟然会成为她的家人！她把我和家族所有人都关进了冷冻舱，因为她担心自己的不轨之举会把我们的耐心消磨殆尽，最终将她赶下王座。”
languages.original_text: {n}Incendia's voice is as dark as the path of an apostate.{/n} "It is a mark left by the kiss of a freezing nightmare. The ungodly Aspyce, to whom I am cursed to be related, had me imprisoned in a cryo-vault, as she did all our family. She was afraid that her transgressions would eventually tip the scales of our patience and we would dethrone her."

traits.locale_text: {n}因森蒂娅变得无比阴冷，仿佛叛教者踏上的道路一般。{/n}“这是那冰寒的地狱留下的吻痕。那个该遭天谴的阿斯拜丝，我何其不幸，竟然会成为她的家人！她把我和家族所有人都关进了冷冻舱，因为她担心自己的不轨之举会把我们的耐心消磨殆尽，最终将她赶下王座。”
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: {n}La voz de Incendia es tan siniestra como la senda de un apóstata.{/n} «Es una marca del beso de una pesadilla helada. La impía Aspyce, con quien tengo la maldición de estar emparentada, me encerró en una cámara criogénica como al resto de mi familia. Le daba miedo que sus transgresiones acabasen por inclinar la balanza de nuestra paciencia y la destronásemos».
languages.original_text: {n}Incendia's voice is as dark as the path of an apostate.{/n} "It is a mark left by the kiss of a freezing nightmare. The ungodly Aspyce, to whom I am cursed to be related, had me imprisoned in a cryo-vault, as she did all our family. She was afraid that her transgressions would eventually tip the scales of our patience and we would dethrone her."

traits.locale_text: {n}La voz de Incendia es tan siniestra como la senda de un apóstata.{/n} «Es una marca del beso de un infierno helado. La impía Aspyce, con quien tengo la maldición de estar emparentada, me encerró en una cámara criogénica como al resto de mi familia. Le daba miedo que sus transgresiones acabasen por inclinar la balanza de nuestra paciencia y la destronásemos».
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: {n}Incendia répond d'une voix aussi sombre que le chemin emprunté par un apostat.{/n} « C'est la marque du baiser d'un cauchemar glacial. Aspyce, cette mécréante dont j'ai le malheur d'être la parente, m'a fait enfermer dans une chambre cryogénique, ainsi que toute notre famille. Elle craignait que ses transgressions viennent à bout de notre patience et que nous finissions par la jeter à bas de son trône. »
languages.original_text: {n}Incendia's voice is as dark as the path of an apostate.{/n} "It is a mark left by the kiss of a freezing nightmare. The ungodly Aspyce, to whom I am cursed to be related, had me imprisoned in a cryo-vault, as she did all our family. She was afraid that her transgressions would eventually tip the scales of our patience and we would dethrone her."

traits.locale_text: {n}Incendia répond d'une voix aussi sombre que le chemin emprunté par un apostat.{/n} « C'est la marque du baiser de l'enfer glacial. Aspyce, cette mécréante dont j'ai le malheur d'être la parente, m'a fait enfermer dans une chambre cryogénique, ainsi que toute notre famille. Elle craignait que ses transgressions viennent à bout de notre patience et que nous finissions par la jeter à bas de son trône. »
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: {n}Incendias Stimme ist so dunkel wie der Pfad eines Apostaten.{/n} "Dieses Zeichen hat der Kuss eines eisigen Albtraums hinterlassen. Die gottlose Aspyce, eine Verwandte von mir, was einem Fluch gleichkommt, hat mich zusammen mit unserer ganzen Familie in ein Cryo-Grab gesperrt. Sie hatte Angst, ihre Verstöße würden irgendwann die Waagschalen unserer Geduld kippen lassen, und wir würden sie vom Thron stürzen."
languages.original_text: {n}Incendia's voice is as dark as the path of an apostate.{/n} "It is a mark left by the kiss of a freezing nightmare. The ungodly Aspyce, to whom I am cursed to be related, had me imprisoned in a cryo-vault, as she did all our family. She was afraid that her transgressions would eventually tip the scales of our patience and we would dethrone her."

traits.locale_text: {n}Incendias Stimme ist so dunkel wie der Pfad eines Apostaten.{/n} "Dieses Zeichen hat der Kuss der zufrierenden Hölle hinterlassen. Die gottlose Aspyce, eine Verwandte von mir, was einem Fluch gleichkommt, hat mich zusammen mit unserer ganzen Familie in ein Cryo-Grab gesperrt. Sie hatte Angst, ihre Verstöße würden irgendwann die Waagschalen unserer Geduld kippen lassen, und wir würden sie vom Thron stürzen."
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: {n}İncendia'nın sesi, bir mürtedin yolu kadar karanlık.{/n} "Dondurucu bir kâbusun öpücüğünün bıraktığı iz işte. Akraba olduğuma lanet ettiğim sapkın Aspyce, ailemizin tüm fertleri gibi beni de kriyomahzene hapsetmişti. Günahlarının er geç sabrımızı taşıracağından ve onu tahttan indireceğimizden korkuyordu."
languages.original_text: {n}Incendia's voice is as dark as the path of an apostate.{/n} "It is a mark left by the kiss of a freezing nightmare. The ungodly Aspyce, to whom I am cursed to be related, had me imprisoned in a cryo-vault, as she did all our family. She was afraid that her transgressions would eventually tip the scales of our patience and we would dethrone her."

traits.locale_text: {n}İncendia'nın sesi, bir mürtedin yolu kadar karanlık.{/n} "Dondurucu bir kâbusun öpücüğünün bıraktığı iz işte. Akraba olduğuma lanet ettiğim sapkın Aspyce, ailemizin tüm fertleri gibi beni de kriyomahzene hapsetmişti. Günahlarının er geç sabrımızı taşıracağından ve onu tahttan indireceğimizden korkuyordu."
